General.Name: Personal Assets Trust plc
General.Description: Personal Assets Trust plc is a closed ended multi asset mutual fund launched and managed by Troy Asset Management Limited. The fund invests in public equity and fixed income markets across the globe. It benchmarks its performance against the FTSE All-Share Index. Personal Assets Trust plc was launched in 1983, and is domiciled in United Kingdom.
General.Address: 33 Davies Street, London, United Kingdom, W1K 4BP

1.Name: Mr. Sebastian Jeremy Michael Lyon
1.Title: Chief Exec. Officer, Investment Director, Portfolio Mang., and Member of the Board
